This is the backport of #25063 to 104X as of 2018/12/20 , including the following commits that have been squashed into a single one:

preliminary backpropagation implementation

more robust backpropagation, now one layer at a time

First running version

debugging completed

Start debugging

Fixng CPE name

debugging. adding time error

code review 1

Fixes for new BTLDetId CrysLayout from topology

back to MTDTrackingRecHit with ClusterRef

Adding back MTDTrackingRecHit with MTDClusterRef

using mtdTrackingRecHits as input

adding RecoMTD globalreco to the Reco sequence. Updating also track with refitted with MTD hits

more consistent use of trajWithMtd

rebase cleanup and code review

Addressing PR comments (from Paolo)

further code review

addressing slava comments

addressing slava comments part2

fill value maps at correct nesting of loops

last comments from Slava on localReco

PSetDesc fix + Kevin

residual commit

Obtained with the following commands on top of the 10_4_X branch:

git cms-rebase-topic 25063
git checkout -b fc-bp25063
git rebase -i HEAD~24 (forcing a squash for all commits on top of the first one)

git diff pull/25063..fc-bp25063 gives an empty output
title: MTD reconstruction - backport to 104X of PR 25063
